parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM keyword_projects WHERE id = {{ $json.isNumeric ? $json.id : 0 }} OR uuid = '{{ $json.isUUID ? $json.id : '' }}' LIMIT 1) as project_id

=SELECT 
  kp.id,
  kp.uuid,
  kp.project_name,
  kp.main_keyword,
  kp.target_country,
  kp.target_language,
  kp.status,
  COALESCE(kp.total_keywords_found, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keyword_results WHERE project_id = kp.id)) as total_keywords_found,
  COALESCE(kp.total_competitors_analyzed, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM competitor_data WHERE project_id = kp.id)) as total_competitors_analyzed,
  COALESCE(kp.total_paa_found, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM paa_data WHERE project_id = kp.id)) as total_paa_found,
  kp.created_at,
  kp.updated_at,
  c.id as client_id,
  c.name as client_name,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keyword_results WHERE project_id = kp.id) as keyword_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keyword_results WHERE project_id = kp.id AND search_intent IS NOT NULL) as analyzed_count
FROM keyword_projects kp
LEFT JOIN clients c ON kp.client_id = c.id
WHERE kp.id = {{ $json.projectId }}
